name: Urban Renewal
description:
This game was made for "Game Jam 4 by Backtrace" in 58 hours.
The theme is "No Violence".

Ege Canıbek - Developer | Animator
Ejder Aysun - Shader Artist
Cem Kaan Uğur - Designer | Developer | Level Designer


Restore the city overtime to it's pre-war state

Special thanks to...

and for assets
